item.title: focus: the ability to control our attention
item.description: Figure 1: Acrylic painting describing a narrowing tunnel using shades of black, blue, and white. Seems to have a person by the end of it, but i am not sure. focus can be defined as the ability to carefully pay attention to something such as a task or a person. it requires a lot of concentration. in the world of sport psycology, focus is a critical skill that must be mastered by all athletes that desire to exceed in their role.
